thread.title: Alex Azar Confirmed as Health and Human Services Secretary

author: Stephanie Armour
title: Alex Azar Confirmed as Health and Human Services Secretary

organizations.name: alex azar confirmed as health and human services

text:
The Senate on Wednesday confirmed President Donald Trump’s nomination of Alex Azar to serve as health and human services secretary, approving a former George W. Bush official who has criticized the Affordable Care Act to lead the agency that implements the law.
The vote was 55-43, largely along party lines, with many Democrats opposing Mr. Azar to express displeasure with his positions or with the Trump administration’s broader health-care agenda.
...
